text: Bouvigny-Boyeffles is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts- de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== An ex-coalmining area, but now a farming village, situated just west of Lens at the junction of the D165 and D75 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Marin, dating from the fifteenth century. * The modern church of St. Martin. * The eighteenth-century chateau of Boyeffles. * The radio and TV transmitter. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Website of the Communaupole de Lens-Liévin Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bouvigny-Boyeffles
